column5: Nice haul there Luc and that sure is a nice Northern congrats.
Good fishing Luc. Big Northern and some nice bass. I head there has been a 49" pike come out of Nipissing. I believe Rob Hyatt caught it.  Really? That is awesome, good for Rob! Was he with a client?
It was several years back and I believe he fishing with a friend.
Beauty Pike!
nice fish and nice pic's, always fun getting a suprise gator, wtg

Went out last Friday in search of some good bass fishing and got treated with a trophy pike.  Started out the morning fishing a Lucky Craft Gunfish (topwater walking bait) and got several good smallies over and on the edges of deeper cabbage, 6-10 fow.  Once the sun came out and got a little warmer, I started targeting pads, grass and wood, and got a few good largies on a texas rigged creature bait.  As I was burning my bait back to the boat to make another flip, this giant northern pike hammered my bait right at the boat and made a line peeling run.  She measured 42" and had a very big head and was really think. This is my first pike from Ontario that was over 40"       Look and the coloration of these two smallies. One was caught in the river on a sandy and wooden bottom, the other was caught in the weeds.
wow nice surprise! that's a beauty gator. I guess the big ones are moving in as the water temps drop with this non-existent summer we've had
Huge pike Luc and some real decent bass to go along with her.
man absolutely sick haul for a day out. Well done.

wow nice surprise! that's a beauty gator. I guess the big ones are moving in as the water temps drop with this non-existent summer we've had  This is what I was thinking. Even found a few places where the smallies have even started to school up. Is summer over already???????
Yikes, that'll make your heart skip a beat.  Nice haul Luc!
Sweet gator! That kind of strike will get your heart rate up in a hurry  Gotta love it!
Not only gave me a heart attack, but gave me a good shower. He splashed me with one kick of the tail as he headed in the opposit direction haha
I was thinkin the same thing! That is a beautiful pike, might be time for some gator fishin!!!
Beauty fish man, congrats.
Very nice northern and bass!
Jeez what a beaut Luc.
Nice fish man!!
42 inches is a great pike anywhere. Congrats
Nice clean gator, from outta the slop to boot
Outstanding catches in all 3 species - congrats! Great pictures too.
Nice fish...doncha just love them rod socks
Congrats Luc.  That is indeed a beauty of a Pike.
nice. luv seeing those pics
Nice gator. Real nice bass.  Well done.
That must of been awesome to see it hit.  Your lucky you didn't fall out of the boat lol
Nice gator, and some very nice Bass, great pics BTW
Loverly pike...a beaut!
Those are beauts, good hunting!
Good fishing Luc. Big Northern and some nice bass. I head there has been a 49" pike come out of Nipissing. I believe Rob Hyatt caught it.
